1.5.name: wordpress/google-chrome-frame-for-wordpress
1.5.description:
This plugin adds simple Google Chrome Frame Capabilities to any Wordpress theme or blog.

THe plugin now provides means to notify IE users of the existance of Google Chrome Frame and also add the ability to prompt them to install.

See http://blog.hdragomir.com/google-chrome-frame-for-wordpress/ for more info.
